00012 #ifndef NORMAL_GEN_H_
00013 #define NORMAL_GEN_H_
00014

00017 #include <Camgen/pltstream.h>

00020 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00021  * Normally distributed random number generator. The class template uses a polar *
00022  * form of the Box-Muller method, avoiding calls to trigonometric functions.     *
00023  *                                                                               *
00024  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00025 
00026 namespace Camorra
00027 {
00031     
00032     template<class value_t,class rng_t>class normal_generator: public MC_object_generator<value_t,value_t,1,true>
00033     {
00034         typedef MC_object_generator<value_t,value_t,1,true> base_type;
00035 
00036         public:
00037 
00038             /* Type definitions: */
00039 
00040             typedef typename base_type::size_type size_type;
00041             typedef typename base_type::value_type value_type;
00042             typedef typename base_type::object_type object_type;
00043             typedef typename base_type::integral_type integral_type;
00044             typedef rng_t rn_engine;
00045             typedef random_number_stream<value_t,rng_t> rn_stream;
00046 
00047             /* Prefactor of the distribution: */
00048 
00049             static const value_type factor;
00050 
00052 
00053             const value_type* mu;
00054 
00056 
00057             const value_type* sigma;
00058 
00060             
00061             normal_generator(const value_type* mu_=NULL,const value_type* sigma_=NULL):mu(mu_),sigma(sigma_),cached(false){}
00062 
00064 
00065             normal_generator(object_type* instance_,const value_type* mu_=NULL,const value_type* sigma_=NULL):base_type(instance_),mu(mu_),sigma(sigma_),cached(false){}
00066 
00068 
00069             normal_generator<value_t,rng_t>* clone() const
00070             {
00071                 return new normal_generator<value_t,rng_t>(*this);
00072             }
00073 
00075 
00076             bool generate()
00077             {
00078                 if(cached)
00079                 {
00080                     this->object()=cache;
00081                     this->weight()=cached_weight;
00082                     cached=false;
00083                 }
00084                 else
00085                 {
00086                     value_type w,x1,x2;
00087                     do
00088                     {
00089                         x1=rn_stream::throw_number(-(value_type)1,(value_type)1);
00090                         x2=rn_stream::throw_number(-(value_type)1,(value_type)1);
00091                         w=x1*x1+x2*x2;
00092                     }
00093                     while(w>=(value_type)1);
00094                     value_type y=(sigma==NULL)?(std::sqrt(-(value_type)2*std::log(w)/w)):(std::sqrt(-(value_type)2*std::log(w)/w)*(*sigma));
00095                     cache=(mu==NULL)?(x1*y):(*mu+x1*y);
00096                     cached_weight=(sigma==NULL)?(std::pow(w,-x1*x1/w)/factor):(std::abs(*sigma)*std::pow(w,-x1*x1/w)/factor);
00097                     this->object()=(mu==NULL)?(x2*y):(*mu+x2*y);
00098                     this->weight()=(sigma==NULL)?(std::pow(w,-x2*x2/w)/factor):(std::abs(*sigma)*std::pow(w,-x2*x2/w)/factor);
00099                     cached=true;
00100                 }
00101                 return true;
00102             }
00103 
00105 
00106             bool evaluate_weight()
00107             {
00108                 value_type z=(mu==NULL)?(this->object()):(this->object()-*mu);
00109                 value_type c;
00110                 if(sigma!=NULL)
00111                 {
00112                     c=factor/std::abs(*sigma);
00113                     z/=(*sigma);
00114                 }
00115                 else
00116                 {
00117                     c=factor;
00118                 }
00119                 z*=((value_type)0.5*z);
00120                 this->weight()=std::exp(z)/c;
00121                 return true;
00122             }
00123 
00124             value_type mean() const
00125             {
00126                 return (mu==NULL)?(value_type)0:(*mu);
00127             }
00128 
00129             value_type variance() const
00130             {
00131                 return (sigma==NULL)?(value_type)1:(*sigma);
00132             }
00133 
00134             function_stream* pdf_plot(const value_type& x) const
00135             {
00136                 value_type norm=x*factor/std::abs(variance());
00137                 std::ostringstream sstrm;
00138                 if(mu==NULL)
00139                 {
00140                     sstrm<<norm<<"*exp(-x**2";
00141                 }
00142                 else
00143                 {
00144                     sstrm<<norm<<"*exp(-(x-"<<*mu<<")**2";
00145                 }
00146                 value_type denom=(value_type)2*std::pow(variance(),(int)2);
00147                 sstrm<<"/"<<denom<<")";
00148                 function_stream* result=new function_stream(sstrm.str());
00149                 result->title="density";
00150                 result->style="lines";
00151                 return result;
00152             }
00153 
00154         private:
00155 
00156             value_type cache,cached_weight;
00157             
00158             /* Bool denoting whether the cache is full: */
00159             
00160             bool cached;
00161     };
00162 
00163     template<class value_t,class rng_t>const typename normal_generator<value_t,rng_t>::value_type normal_generator<value_t,rng_t>::factor=(value_t)1/std::sqrt((value_t)2*std::acos(-(value_t)1));
00164 }
00165 
00166 #endif /*NORMAL_GEN_H_*/
